bug.author: rotorliu
bug.description:
I set the dataset repository of new task like this: <denchmark-link:http://172.23.129.161/user/annos-repo.git>http://172.23.129.161/user/annos-repo.git</denchmark-link>
I got this exception as follow: Exception in plugin Git Plugin: Error: Repository status check failed. Exception: Got URL doesn't sutisfy for regular expression How to fix? Thank you!

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/rotorliu>@rotorliu</denchmark-link> , probably it is a bug. I believe we have to support IP address as well.
